article_title: If Donald Trump or Hillary Clinton wins, will you move to Canada?
article_text:
If Donald Trump becomes president, Lena Dunham says she will move to Canada and Jon Stewart says he will leave Earth

A pro-Bernie Sanders Facebook page promotes moving to Costa Rica if Hillary Clinton wins

There was a surge in U.S. citizens granted permanent-resident status in Canada in the years immediately following George W. Bush’s re-election

article_metadata.news-keywords: Canada, Donald Trump, Rush Limbaugh, Hillary Clinton, Mexico, immigration
article_metadata.description: Voters have threatened to move to Mexico, Canada or elsewhere if Donald Trump wins, but such threats during presidential election years are clichés, although there is anecdotal evidence that some move in response to elections.
article_metadata.title: If Donald Trump or Hillary Clinton wins, will you move to Canada? | Miami Herald
